Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Qhureyshi korosuk duma sinaamak makina hora bayisneeh, usun qandeh keenik gibiduk, tokkel baaxooxat mekki iyyeenihik, eleelitan rike maay geen yallih digaala keenit temeete waqdi? (magennon)
Diggah, tohut kassit yan raaqisa sorkocobbaxa-le numuh, hinnay usuk hangi edde-luk sorkocobbaxi kaak aracal anuk ayti kah yeceeh ankacse numuh
Yalli xiibitak iyyeh; nummah qaranwaa kee baaxooy, ken nammayih fanat tanim lica ayróh addat ginneeh, hebeltô taqbi nee maxaginna wohul
Nabiyow usun iyyaanamal isbiraay ku- Rabbi Faylisak salat-ab, ayró tawqek naharataay (subci salat), ayro kortak naharat (qasri salat)
Kaadu barak-tut salat kaah abaay, fardi salaatitteh lakal sunnâ salat abaay, Yalla cus. (uzkur)
Kaadu xayikkeek israafil deqsita malaykatti seeca ayró ankacis nabiyow
Toh nammay haytô baantah xongoló nummah edde yaabben ayró kinniih, too ayro is mawqah ayróy magooqak edde yawqeeni kinni
Diggah yalli ginó taynuwweeh qiddam (rabissam) Neé kaadu madaara Nee fan takke iyye
Baaxó keenil qanxixxa ayró, usun magooqak sissikuk yawqen, toh nel xabcin kobxisiyya (gaaboysiyya) cisab booxal
A-koros ittaamat ixxigah nanu nayse, kaadu nabiyow atu ken dirkisé hinnito islaąamaninnol, kinnih immay yi-digaalak meesita mara Qhuraanat kassis
Yalli xiibiteh burtá fixiixisiyyah fixiixisa caacayal
Kaadu kaxxam qilsi lee yakkuqe qambuurul xiibite
Kaadu baddi bagul caalih gexa dawaanikil xiibite
Kaadu Yallih amri ginô fanal keefiyta (kurta) malaykal xiibite
Cagalah ta seehaday elle xagnisinteenim, ugut kee cisaabak akkelem asmat-le numma
Kaadu diggah, abten taamoomik cisab kee galto asmatah akkele
